Since the early 19th Century, it has been the custom of the Hine family to set aside the best Cognac produced during a particularly outstanding year for their own use, ultimately to be served to honored guests. Only 3 years ago, and for the first time, Francois Hine, the managing director of this venerable firm, has consented to part with a few of these treasured bottles—each is numbered and bears a back label relating the unique history of the contents, hand signed by a director. Normally $24.75. Quantity limited.
